This conditioner works to reverse the signs of over-processing and styling damage. The bespoke formula is applied as a spray, and the more often it is used, the more benefits it imparts. The unique formula is enriched with active ingredients and natural plant oils to deliver intense hydration without any greasy feel. Exceptionally easy to use, the spray gives maximum control with minimum waste. It is lightweight enough to be used every day, if desired, and will reset your expectations about wash-out conditioners.
What else you need to know:

"Styling, sun, pollution or just life—hair comes under stress every day. This no fuss formula powers way beyond traditional conditioners to fast track even the most fragile hair to healthy."—Vernon François, Creative Director and Founder This product is safe for hair that has undergone color or keratin treatments.
